post.body: follow @problogger if ur not following. Also visit his blog he has great content which will b useful 4 u.
Yesterday I read imp of reviewing bfore publishing any post, and 2day only I realized its imp when noticed silly mistake in BBC's website.
Downloading some free christmas songs.
Got some great photos of beautiful local birds & rare seasonal wild flowers.
Its been a beautifull morning out here. Heading out for some photo shooting.
Damn! Some problem in my PC, restarting regularly. ¤=#~§
How to Create a Christmas Twitter Avatar using Twixenate http://bit.ly/DUuv
Its been a long and tedious day 4 me, even no time to tweet in between. So goodnight to all of u. C u all 2morrow.
Working on my blog to relaunch it on 1 Jan.
And ya, I know how to google so don't suggest that. I want some personal suggestions.
Does anybody knows good website to download snowy christmas wallpapers?
My digital inbox is zero now. It took me one and half hour to proceed all 2014 mails accumulated in 2 days.
Finally I am back, after 2 days of being offline.
I am up now and doing some exercise on my terrace. Very beautiful morning over here.
Goodnight to all tweople. See you tomorrow.
Reading: Participation Inequality, a harsh truth about internet users. Co'mon all u lurkers contribute something http://snipr.com/8x50p
Reading: Power of Oprah http://snipr.com/8x4cp
Today I am so happy b'coz I am able to keep myself away from twitter for half of the day. Really challenging.
Holiday already started and I don't know what to do, getting so bored. Any suggestions.
Goodnight/morning to all tweople. I am heading towards bed.
